text: "(Feels Like) Heaven" is a 1983 song by Scottish new wave Fiction Factory and is the second single from their debut studio album Throw the Warped Wheel Out. It went to number 6 in the United Kingdom, number 4 in Ireland, number 1 in Paraguay, number 2 in Switzerland, number 10 in Germany, number 20 in Austria, number 24 in New Zealand and number 16 in the Netherlands. ==Track listing== 7" # "(Feels Like) Heaven" # "Everyone but You" 12" # "(Feels Like) Heaven" (Remix) # "Everyone but You" # "This Is" ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:Sophisti-pop songs
title: (Feels Like) Heaven
